REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0768 reute d f BC-MICKELBERRY-<MBC>-COM 03-26 0057

TEXT.TITLE: MICKELBERRY <MBC> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Mickelberry Corp said it has completed the previously-announced sale of the 51 pct of its C and W Group subsidiary that it had retained to N W Ayer Inc for undisclosed terms. Ayer bought the other 49 pct next year. Mickelberry said it will report a gain on the transaction. Reuter
